historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

DC CODE ยง 29-304.41

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A corporation may acquire its own shares and shares so acquired shall constitute authorized but unissued shares.
If the articles of incorporation prohibit the reissue of the acquired shares, the number of authorized shares shall be reduced by the number of shares acquired.

part.text: Subsequent Acquisition of Shares by Shareholders and Corporation.

heading.catch_text: Corporation's acquisition of its own shares.
